title: Nowadays: Is small children are getting eye-sight in their early age, why? - Quora

response.answer_text: The answer is pretty simple actually. Mobile phones and TV. Since parents are too busy with their lives they tend to allow them to watch TV or play with mobiles/laptops/tabs/play stations to keep them at bay coupled with non-availability of playing space/area in most colonies/flats with dense population and multi-storied buildings around. This uncontrolled activity is not even restricted by a time limit, this exposes their tender eyes to radiation, bright light and strain them resulting in issues with vision which need correction by way of spectacles.
